00033 template <typename TYPE>
00034 class SimpleListElement
00035 {
00036     friend class SimpleList<TYPE>;
00037     friend class SimpleRecycleList<TYPE>;
00038
00039 public:
00041     SimpleListElement()
00042     {
00043         NextElement = NULL;
00044     }
00045
00047     void Init()
00048     {
00049           NextElement = NULL;
00050     }
00051
00053     virtual ~SimpleListElement();
00054
00055 private:
00056     TYPE ElementContainer;
00057      SimpleListElement<TYPE> * NextElement;
00058 };

00195 template <typename TYPE>
00196 SimpleList<TYPE>::SimpleList()
00197 {
00198     // There is nothing in the list
00199     NumberOfElements = 0;
00200     Head = NULL;
00201     Tail = NULL;
00202
00203     // There is no position at all
00204     PreviousElement = NULL;
00205     CurrentElement = NULL;
00206     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00207 }

00215 // Access fonction
00216 template <typename TYPE>
00217 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::Add( const TYPE& Val )
00218 {
00219     SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = GetNewSimpleListElement();
00220     if ( tmp == NULL ) // Plus assez de memoire
00221         return false;
00222
00223     tmp->ElementContainer = Val;
00224     if ( Head == NULL ) // La liste etait vide
00225     {
00226         Tail =    Head = tmp;
00227     }
00228     else
00229     {
00230         // Le nouveau devient le dernier
00231         Tail->NextElement = tmp;
00232         Tail = tmp;
00233
00234         //if ( Head->NextElement == NULL )
00235         //{
00236         //    Head->NextElement = tmp;
00237         //}
00238     }
00239
00240     // On incremente le nombre d'objet dans la liste
00241     NumberOfElements++;
00242
00243     // Tout est ok
00244     return true;
00245 }
00246
00251 template <typename TYPE>
00252 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::AddHead( const TYPE& Val )
00253 {
00254     SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = GetNewSimpleListElement();
00255     if ( tmp == NULL ) // Plus assez de memoire
00256         return false;
00257
00258     tmp->ElementContainer = Val;
00259     if ( Head == NULL ) // La liste etait vide
00260     {
00261         Tail =    Head = tmp;
00262     }
00263     else
00264     {
00265         // Le nouveau devient le dernier
00266         // Head->NextElement = tmp;
00267         tmp->NextElement = Head;
00268         Head = tmp;
00269     }
00270
00271     // On incremente le nombre d'objet dans la liste
00272     NumberOfElements++;
00273
00274     // Tout est ok
00275     return true;
00276 }

00282 template <typename TYPE>
00283 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::AddTail( const TYPE& Val )
00284 {
00285     // just call the add function
00286     return Add(Val);
00287 }

00295 // Set position to the first element
00296 template <typename TYPE>
00297 void SimpleList<TYPE>::First()
00298 {
00299     PreviousElement = NULL;
00300     CurrentElement = Head;
00301     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00302 }
00303
00304 // Set position to the next element
00305 template <typename TYPE>
00306 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::Next()
00307 {
00308     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00309     if ( CurrentElement == NULL ){
00310         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00311         return false;
00312     }
00313
00314     //seb
00315     if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured){
00316         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00317         // Previous and Current have already the good value
00318         return true;
00319     }
00320
00321     // Here we can go forward in the list
00322     PreviousElement = CurrentElement;
00323     CurrentElement  = CurrentElement->NextElement;
00324
00325     // Have we reach the end of the list ?
00326     if ( CurrentElement == NULL )
00327     {
00328         return false;
00329     }
00330
00331     return true;
00332 }
00333
00334 // Set position to the next element
00335 template <typename TYPE>
00336 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::AtEnd() const
00337 {
00338     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00339     if ( CurrentElement == NULL )
00340         return true;
00341
00342     return false;
00343 }
00344
00345 // Set position to the next element
00346 template <typename TYPE>
00347 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::NotAtEnd() const
00348 {
00349     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00350     if ( CurrentElement != NULL )
00351         return true;
00352
00353     return false;
00354 }
00355
00356 // Get the current element of the list
00357 template <typename TYPE>
00358 TYPE& SimpleList<TYPE>::GetCurrent() const
00359 {
00360     if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured)
00361         throw SimpleListException("SimpleList<TYPE>::GetCurrent : Forbidden after a call to RemoveCurrent");
00362     return CurrentElement->ElementContainer;
00363 }
00364
00365 // Remove the current element
00366 template <typename TYPE>
00367 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::RemoveCurrent()
00368 {
00369     if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured)
00370         throw SimpleListException("SimpleList<TYPE>::RemoveCurrent : Forbidden after a previous call to RemoveCurrent");
00371     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = true;
00372     SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp = CurrentElement;
00373
00374     if ( tmp == NULL )
00375     {
00376         // We must call at least First on a non empty list
00377         return false;
00378     }
00379
00380     // Here we have a current element...
00381     // Are we at the begining of the SimpleList ?
00382     if ( Head == tmp )
00383     {
00384         // Yes, wa are !
00385         Head = tmp->NextElement;
00386
00387         // PreviousElement remains the same :
00388         // PreviousElement == NULL
00389
00390         // The new current element if the next in the list, so the head
00391         CurrentElement = Head;
00392     }
00393     else
00394     {
00395         // We are not at the begining of the list
00396         // Here we can remove directly the element within the list
00397         tmp = CurrentElement;
00398         PreviousElement->NextElement = tmp->NextElement;
00399         CurrentElement = tmp->NextElement;
00400     }
00401
00402     // Was the element the last item of the list ?
00403     if ( Tail == tmp )
00404     {
00405         // We have remove the last item of the list
00406         Tail = PreviousElement;
00407     }
00408
00409     // Delete the old current element
00410      ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00411
00412     // Change the element count
00413     NumberOfElements--;
00414
00415     return true;
00416 }
00417
00418 // Remove a specific element
00419 template <typename TYPE>
00420 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::Remove(const TYPE& Element)
00421 {
00422     for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00423     {
00424         if ( GetCurrent() == Element )
00425         {
00426             RemoveCurrent();
00427             return true;
00428         }
00429     }
00430     return false;
00431 }
00432
00433 template <typename TYPE>
00434 void SimpleList<TYPE>::Empty()
00435 {
00436     SimpleListElement<TYPE> * tmp;
00437     // On libere tous les elements de la liste
00438     while( Head != NULL )
00439     {
00440         tmp = Head;
00441         Head = Head->NextElement; // On dechaine le premier element
00442         ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00443         NumberOfElements--; // Non obligatoire !
00444     }
00445 }
00446
00447 template <typename TYPE>
00448 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::IsEmpty() const
00449 { return Head == NULL; }
00450
00451 template <typename TYPE>
00452 bool SimpleList<TYPE>::IsNotEmpty() const
00453 { return Head != NULL; }
00454
00455 template <typename TYPE>
00456 TYPE SimpleList<TYPE>::ExtractFirst()
00457 {
00458   if(IsEmpty())
00459     throw SimpleListException("SimpleList<TYPE>::ExtractFirst : Forbidden when the list is empty");
00460
00461   SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt = Head;
00462   if(Head == Tail)
00463     {
00464       Head = NULL; Tail = NULL;
00465     }else{
00466       Head = elt->NextElement;
00467     }
00468   NumberOfElements--;
00469
00470   TYPE tmp = elt->ElementContainer;
00471   ReleaseSimpleListElement(elt);
00472   return tmp;
00473 }

00475 template <typename TYPE>
00476 SimpleListElement<TYPE>*  SimpleList<TYPE>::GetNewSimpleListElement() const
00477 {
00478     return new OMISCID_TLM SimpleListElement<TYPE>;
00479 }

00481 template <typename TYPE>
00482 void SimpleList<TYPE>::ReleaseSimpleListElement(SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt) const
00483 {
00484     delete elt;
00485 }

00496 template <typename TYPE>
00497 class MutexedSimpleList : public SimpleList<TYPE>
00498 {
00499 public:
00500 #ifdef DEBUG
00501     MutexedSimpleList()
00502     {
00503         NbLocks = 0; // MutexedSimpleList is not lock
00504     }
00505
00506     virtual ~MutexedSimpleList()
00507     {
00508         NbLocks = 100; // MutexedSimpleList is not lock anymore,
00509         // All operation will be permitted to destroy the list
00510     }
00511
00512     bool Add( const TYPE& Val )
00513     {
00514         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00515         {
00516             fprintf( stderr, "Using Add on a non lock list.\n" );
00517         }
00518         return SimpleList<TYPE>::Add(Val);
00519     }
00520
00521     bool AddHead( const TYPE& Val )
00522     {
00523         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00524         {
00525             fprintf( stderr, "Using AddHeah on a non lock list.\n" );
00526         }
00527         return SimpleList<TYPE>::AddHead(Val);
00528     }
00529
00530     bool AddTail( const TYPE& Val )
00531     {
00532         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00533         {
00534             fprintf( stderr, "Using AddTail on a non lock list.\n" );
00535         }
00536         return SimpleList<TYPE>::AddTail(Val);
00537     }
00538
00539     unsigned int GetNumberOfElements() const
00540     {
00541         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00542         {
00543             fprintf( stderr, "Using GetNumberOfElements on a non lock list.\n" );
00544         }
00545         return SimpleList<TYPE>::GetNumberOfElements();
00546     }
00547
00548     void First()
00549     {
00550         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00551         {
00552             fprintf( stderr, "Using First on a non lock list.\n" );
00553         }
00554         SimpleList<TYPE>::First();
00555     }
00556
00557     bool Next()
00558     {
00559         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00560         {
00561             fprintf( stderr, "Using Next on a non lock list.\n" );
00562         }
00563         return SimpleList<TYPE>::Next();
00564     }
00565

00567     {
00568         if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00569         {
00570             fprintf( stderr, "Using AtEnd on a non lock list.\n" );
00571         }

00674
00675 template <typename TYPE>
00676 bool MutexedSimpleList<TYPE>::Lock()
00677 {
00678 #ifdef DEBUG
00679     // Only for MutexedSimpleList debugging
00680     bool ret = mutex.EnterMutex();
00681
00682     if ( ret == true )
00683     {
00684         NbLocks++;
00685     }
00686     return ret;
00687 #else
00688     return mutex.EnterMutex();
00689 #endif
00690 }
00691
00692 template <typename TYPE>
00693 bool MutexedSimpleList<TYPE>::Unlock()
00694 {
00695 #ifdef DEBUG
00696     if ( NbLocks == 0 )
00697     {
00698         OmiscidTrace( "List already unlock. something goes wrong ?" );
00699     }
00700
00701     // Only for MutexedSimpleList debugging
00702     bool ret = mutex.LeaveMutex();
00703
00704     if ( ret == true && NbLocks > 0)
00705     {
00706         NbLocks++;
00707     }
00708     return ret;
00709 #else
00710     return mutex.LeaveMutex();
00711 #endif
00712 }
